course.subject: SOSC
course.name: Contemporary Hong Kong: Critical Issues
course.description: The course provides an overview about Hong Kong society and addresses from an interdisciplinary perspective a set of critical issues arising from its socio-economic, cultural and political development. It looks at Hong Kong comparatively and globally, drawing students' attention to its uniqueness and similarities vis-Ã -vis other global cities, as well as its relation with China and the world.
course.exclusions: SOSC1661, SOSC 1662
